title: 87/52/ECSC: Commission Decision of 12 December 1986 extending the authorization of the joint selling of fuels from Houillères du Bassin de Lorraine and Saarbergwerke AG by 'Saarlor'
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 December 1986
extending the authorization of the joint selling of fuels from Houillères du Bassin de Lorraine and Saarbergwerke AG by 'Saarlor'
(87/52/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The period of validity of Decision No 44/59 is hereby extended until 31 December 1991.
This Decision is addressed to the coal-mining undertakings concerned and to Saarlor.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 December 1986.
For the Commission
Peter SUTHERLAND
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 58, 14. 11. 1959, p. 1147/59.
(2) OJ No L 63, 6. 3. 1982, p. 25.
